title: Elementary Mathematics Problem-Solving Skills Enhancement Course Through Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computational skills and experience with simple problem-solving
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning integrating offline activities with smartphone-based collaboration tools

learning_goals: Learners can transform real-life problems into mathematical models collaboratively on online collaboration platforms.
Learners can propose three or more strategies for solving complex problems through collaborative discussions.
Learners can exchange feedback using mathematical communication skills in blended online/offline activities.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
